A D E G I L M P R T

G

GraphWithAnimLine - class display.GraphWithAnimLine.
As ExamplesGraph but displays a line which can be animated.
GraphWithAnimLine(int, int, int[], int[], boolean[], ExtendedLine) - Constructor for class display.GraphWithAnimLine
Create a new graph with an animated line which rotates around the centre of the graph area.
GraphWithAnimLine(int, int, int[], int[], boolean[], ExtendedLine, LineAnimator) - Constructor for class display.GraphWithAnimLine
Create a new graph with animated line.
getd() - Method in class display.ExtendedLine
Returns the closest approach of the line to the origin.
getwx() - Method in class display.ExtendedLine
Returns the x-component of the normal vector of the line.
getwy() - Method in class display.ExtendedLine
Returns the y-component of the normal vector of the line.
